Question
========
  
Evaluate the following two statements:

I. The larger the Chi-squared test size, the smaller the corresponding p-value.

II. The smaller the sample size, the larger the number of degrees of freedom the Chi-squared distribution has.

  
Answerlist
----------
* I: false, II: false
* I: true, II: false
* I: false, II: true
* I: true, II: true
